doc.title: Dispatch
doc.plot: In a world where the action of war has become so commonplace, Dispatch depicts a vivid stream of early war footage representing our detachment from the reality of war, the atomic bomb at the flick of a switch and the global coverage on satellite TV. At no time in the past have we been kept further from the atrocities of war and the acceptance of going to war now appears an easier pill to swallow.
